named-query.name: USER_AUTHENTICATE
named-query.query: SELECT U.status FROM User U WHERE LOWER(U.userName) = LOWER(:userName) AND U.password =:password

named-query.name: USER_FIND_MENU
named-query.query: SELECT L1 FROM Menu L1 LEFT OUTER JOIN L1.subMenus L2 LEFT OUTER JOIN L2.subMenus L3 WHERE L1.permissions IN ( :permissions) OR L2.permissions IN ( :permissions) OR L3.permissions IN ( :permissions)
